author: Ursula Perano
title: Poll: Majority of Americans don't trust Trump on coronavirus
description: 36% of Americans say they trust what President Trump has said about the coronavirus outbreak, while 52% say they do not, according to an NBC News/Wall Street Journal poll.Why it matters: Trump's daily coronavirus briefings have been rife with misinformation. …
content:
36% of Americans say they trust what President Trump has said about the coronavirus outbreak, while 52% say they do not, according to an NBC News/Wall Street Journal poll.
Why it matters: Trump's daily coronavirus briefings have been rife with misinformation… [+1755 chars]
